meanings.definition: Opposite or contrary in position, direction, order, or effect.
meanings.sent1: The shirt was inside out, showing its reversed side.
meanings.sent2: The mirror reflected a reversed image of the room.
meanings.sent3: The cat walked in a reversed manner, tail first.
meanings.sent4: Her opinion on the matter was completely reversed after the discussion.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's explanation was so clear, it made the concept of fractions seem reversed.

meanings.definition: Turned the other way around or upside down.
meanings.sent1: The reversed painting hung on the wall, with the sky at the bottom.
meanings.sent2: The map was displayed in a reversed orientation, making it hard to navigate.
meanings.sent3: The cake looked funny with its reversed frosting design.
meanings.sent4: His world felt reversed when he woke up in a different country.
meanings.sent5: The upside-down roller coaster ride made everything seem reversed and thrilling.

meanings.definition: To change to the opposite in character or effect.
meanings.sent1: She reversed her decision after hearing new information.
meanings.sent2: The magician reversed the direction of the card in his hand.
meanings.sent3: The chef accidentally reversed the salt and sugar in the recipe.
meanings.sent4: His kindness reversed the negative opinion others had of him.
meanings.sent5: The medication quickly reversed the symptoms of the illness.
